scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:www
scripts.build:api: cd packages/api && npm i && npm build
scripts.build:www: cd packages/www && npm i && npm build
scripts.start: npm run start:api && npm run start:www
scripts.start:api: cd packages/api && pm2 start npm --name layout-api -- start
scripts.start:www: cd packages/www && pm2 start npm --name layout-www -- start
scripts.start-staging: npm run start:api && npm run start:www
scripts.start-staging:api: cd packages/api && pm2 start npm --name layout-staging-api -- start
scripts.start-staging:www: cd packages/www && pm2 start npm --name layout-staging-www -- start
